mapper.select:
select s.sns_wrt_no , s.sns_title , s.sns_ctt , s.sns_write_date , s.sns_tag , s.sns_hit , m.name , s.mem_id , g.grp_name ,( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sns_like l where l.sns_wrt_no = s.sns_wrt_no ) as like_cnt
from sns s join sns_grp g on s.sns_grp_no = g.sns_grp_no join mem m on s.mem_id = m.mem_id
order by s.sns_wrt_no desc

select a.attach_origin_name , a.attach_save_name , a.attach_path , a.attach_ext , a.attach_table_div , a.attach_table_pk FROM attach a JOIN SNS s ON a.attach_table_pk = s.sns_wrt_no WHERE a.attach_table_div= 's' AND s.sns_wrt_no = #{snsWrtNo}

select s.sns_wrt_no , s.sns_title , s.sns_ctt , s.sns_write_date , s.sns_tag , s.sns_hit , m.name , s.mem_id , g.grp_name ,( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sns_like l where l.sns_wrt_no = s.sns_wrt_no ) as like_cnt ,(SELECT ATTACH_PATH FROM ATTACH where s.sns_wrt_no = attach_table_pk AND attach_table_div = 's') as ATTACH_PATH from sns s join sns_grp g on s.sns_grp_no = g.sns_grp_no join mem m on s.mem_id = m.mem_id where sns_wrt_no= #{snsWrtNo}
